level.text: 807.1 The Board may give warnings for first-time sale to minor offenses,xcluding “egregious” sale to minor violations. Egregious shall be defineds “a sale to minor violation where the licensee: (1) sold or served anlcoholic beverage to a minor who was unable to produce a valid identificationfter a request from the licensee to do so, or (2) intentionally sold anlcoholic beverage to a minor.”
Source: Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 8686 (September 24, 2010).
